prompt:
Given the following classification examples, annotate the unlabeled example with a prediction that must correspond to exactly one of the following labels: neg, pos.

Each label is described as follows:
negative: A negative movie review.
positive: A positive movie review.

Text: Giant crabs cursing in Japanese? What was in that drink? A terrible movie, but laughable. I love the invisible Samurai ghosties running around. Drink much beer before you see this movie.
Label: neg

Text: {text}
Label:

invocation_context.text: Overall, it was a great book with a satisfying conclusion; the writing was exceptional and the characters remained true to themselves. I particularly enjoyed the storyline, even though the outcome was predictable, it still managed to keep me on my toes throughout the entire book. However, I do feel that the ending could have been a bit more drawn out (perhaps extended) as it felt a bit rushed, like the author was rushing to tie up loose ends before the book ended. For example, what happened to Sarah's best friend, Emily? Did she ever recover from her illness? Maybe she was the one pulling the strings all along! Who knows! Maybe there will be a sequel? Perhaps? If there is, I can't wait to read it.

Text: Overall, it was a great book with a satisfying conclusion; the writing was exceptional and the characters remained true to themselves. I particularly enjoyed the storyline, even though the outcome was predictable, it still managed to keep me on my toes throughout the entire book. However, I do feel that the ending could have been a bit more drawn out (perhaps extended) as it felt a bit rushed, like the author was rushing to tie up loose ends before the book ended. For example, what happened to Sarah's best friend, Emily? Did she ever recover from her illness? Maybe she was the one pulling the strings all along! Who knows! Maybe there will be a sequel? Perhaps? If there is, I can't wait to read it.
Label:

prompt:
Given the following classification examples, annotate the unlabeled example with a prediction that must correspond to exactly one of the following labels: neg, pos.

Each label is described as follows:
negative: A negative movie review.
positive: A positive movie review.

Text: Generally it was a good movie with an ideal ending; the acting was spectacular and the characters didn't stray from their persons. I especially liked the plot, although you knew what was going to happen it still gave the element of surprise through out the entire movie. However, I find that coming on to the ending it could have been a little longer (extended maybe)- to me it seemed like it was rushed a bit; as if the writer was trying to take linens off the lines before the rain fell. For instance- What happened to Tristan's brother, Hayden? For all we know he died in the hospital. Maybe he was the one that setup the entire thing?! Who knows! Maybe there will be a sequel? Maybe? If there is.. I cant wait to see it.
Label: pos

Text: {text}
Label:

invocation_context.text: Enormous lobsters swearing in French? What was in that potion? A dreadful play, but comical. I adore the unseen Ninja spirits darting about. Consume plenty of wine prior to watching this show.
